subject: Personal Finance
title: Payday Lending
description: A micro-lesson that makes Payday Lending usable.

hook.text: A two-week payday loan with a $15 fee on $100 sounds small. That's 391% APR.

buildup.text: Payday lenders offer fast cash against your next paycheck, targeting people with no other options.

discovery.text: 80% of payday loans are rolled over or followed by another loan within 14 days.

twist.text: The average borrower spends 200 days per year in payday loan debt. It's designed to be permanent.

climax.text: Payday lenders cluster in low-income neighborhoods. There are more payday shops than McDonald's in the US.

quiz.question: What is the effective APR of a typical payday loan?
